attributes.action:
Democracy has Spoken.
Do not hold a second European Union Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
The Highest Turn Out of Voters (71.8 %)
Last Referendum on EU was 40 Years Ago (1975 - Labour Govt.)
Pound Sterling is still Stronger than the Euro

English Results 53.4% Leave EU
Welsh Results 52.5% Leave EU
attributes.background:
Democracy has spoken. 52% of the population wanted to Exit the European Union. Because some did not get the outcome they hoped is not a reason to hold another referendum. 

This has been an issue for British people for many years. We the people, have the answer. Let us move on as a united country.
